		{
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "alchemist2heroes/_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "GainGold"
			"gold" "%onlevel_gold"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		}

			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"						"25 30 35"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"damage"						"4 5 6"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"bonus_gold"					"4 5 6"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/items2_fx/hand_of_midas.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles\status_fx\status_effect_alchemist_gold_armor.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_alchemist/alchemist_lasthit_coins.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_alchemist/alchemist_lasthit_msg_gold.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_items.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"ApplyModifier"
			{
			"ModifierName" "alchemist_motherloads_bonus_gold_mod"
			"Target" "TARGET"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		"alchemist_gold_armor_mod"
			{
			"Duration" "10"
			"IsBuff" "1"
			"IsPurgable" "0"
			"StatusEffectName" "particles\status_fx\status_effect_alchemist_gold_armor.vpcf"
			"StatusEffectPriority" "15"
			"Properties"
				{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS" "%regen"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT" "%regen"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEATTACK_BONUSDAMAGE" "%regen"
				}
			}
		"alchemist_motherloads_bonus_gold_mod"
			{
			"Duration" "%duration"
			"OnKill"
				{
				"RunScript"
					{
					"ScriptFile" "heroes/alchemist_abilities.lua"
					"Function" "alchemist_multiply_gold_tgt"
					"gold" "%percent"
					}
				}
			}
		"alchemist_motherloads_target_mod"
			{
			"Duration" "%duration"
			"OnCreated"
				{
				"RunScript"
					{
					"ScriptFile" "heroes/alchemist_abilities.lua"
					"Function" "alchemist_increase_bounty_tgt"
					"gold" "%percent"
					}
				}
			"OnDestroy"
				{
				"RunScript"
					{
					"ScriptFile" "heroes/alchemist_abilities.lua"
					"Function" "alchemist_reset_bounty_tgt"
					}
				}
			}
		}

					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/alexander_abilities.lua"

						"hp_armor"		"%hp_armor"
					}
				}
			}

// Rewrite of the Viper Poison Attack ability
// Author: Pizzalol
// Date: 18.12.2014.
"artificer_unmaking"
{
    // General
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    //"BaseClass"             "ability_lua"
    //"ScriptFile"            "lua/abilities/artificer_unmaking.lua"
    "BaseClass"               "ability_datadriven"
    "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AUTOCAST | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ATTACK"
    "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
    "AbilityUnitTargetType"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
    "AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
    "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
    "AbilityTextureName"            "artificer_unmaking"

    // Precache
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "precache"
    {
        "soundfile"     "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_terrorblade.vsndevts"
        "particle"      "particles/units/heroes/hero_artificer/unmaking_attack.vpcf"
        "particle"      "particles/units/heroes/hero_artificer/unmaking_unit.vpcf"
    }

    // Casting
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"              "425"
    "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0"

    // Time     
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCooldown"               "0.0"

    // Damage.
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityDamage"                 "0 0 0 0"

    // Cost
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"               "60"

    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type"                      "FIELD_FLOAT"
            "duration"                      "4.0"
        }
        "02"
        {
            "var_type"                      "FIELD_FLOAT"
            "damage"                        "3.25 4.50 5.75 7.00" // Percent of Current Health per second
        }
        "03"
        {
            "var_type"                      "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "base_damage"                   "20 30 40 50"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers"
    {
        "modifier_unmaking_orb_attack"
        {
            "Passive"   "1"
            "IsHidden"  "1"

            "Orb"
            {
                "Priority"          "DOTA_ORB_PRIORITY_ABILITY"
                "ProjectileName"    "particles/units/heroes/hero_artificer/unmaking_attack.vpcf"
                "CastAttack"        "1"
            }

            "OnOrbFire"
            {
                "SpendMana"
                {
                    "Mana"  "%AbilityManaCost"
                }

                "FireSound"
                {
                    "EffectName"    "Hero_Terrorblade.ConjureImage"
                    "Target"        "CASTER"
                }
            }

            "OnOrbImpact"
            {
                "ApplyModifier"
                {
                    "ModifierName"  "modifier_unmaking_debuff"
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                }

                "FireSound"
                {
                    "EffectName"    "Hero_Terrorblade.Metamorphosis"
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                }

                "RunScript"
                {
                    "ScriptFile"    "heroes/artificer_abilities.lua"
                    "Function"        "unmakingHit"
                    "damage"        "%base_damage"
                }
            }
        }

        "modifier_unmaking_debuff"
        {
            "IsDebuff"  "1"
            "Duration"  "%duration"

            "EffectName"    "particles/units/heroes/hero_artificer/unmaking_unit.vpcf"
            "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"

            "ThinkInterval" "1.0"

            "OnIntervalThink"
            {
                "RunScript"
                {
                    "ScriptFile"    "heroes/artificer_abilities.lua"
                    "Function"      "unmakingTick"
                    "damage"        "%damage"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}"astaroth_deathmark"
{
    // General
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "BaseClass"             "ability_lua"
    "ScriptFile"            "lua/abilities/astaroth_deathmark.lua"
    "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
    "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
    "AbilityUnitTargetType"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HEROES"
    "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
    "AbilityTextureName"            "astaroth_deathmark"
    
    // Casting
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

// ASTAROTH: Pain Transferral
//=====================================================================================================
"astaroth_pain_transferral"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"astaroth_pain_transferral"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"700"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"25"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"20"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"						"15 30 45 60"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_astaroth/astaroth_pain_transferral.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_keeper_of_the_light.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents\hero_astaroth.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_astaroth_ptransferral_effects"
				"Target" 		"TARGET"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_astaroth_ptransferral_effects"
			{
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
			
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_astaroth/astaroth_pain_transferral.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_customorigin"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"TARGET"	"attach_hitloc"
						}
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_astaroth_ptransferral_passive"
			{
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/astaroth_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"pain_transferral"
						"attack_damage" "%attack_damage"
						"mult"			"%damage"
					}
				}
			}
		}
}

"baal_otherworld"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_1"
	"AnimationPlaybackRate"			"0.8"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"baal_otherworld"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.6"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"40"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"110 140 170 200"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"4 5 6 7"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_ms"						"15 20 25 30"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"mres_reduction"				"-50"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_screen_effect.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_start_cast.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/hero_baal.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_otherworld_particle_thinker"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_otherworld"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"otherworld_cast"
				"cast"			"1"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_otherworld"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"

				"Priority" "MODIFIER_PRIORITY_ULTRA"

				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_ghost.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

				"ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_check"
					}
				}

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_screenspace"
					}
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_stop"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_cast"
						"cast"			"0"
					}
					"CreateThinker"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_otherworld_particle_thinker"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ABSOLUTE_NO_DAMAGE_PHYSICAL" "1"
					//"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_INVISIBILITY_LEVEL"			"4"
					//"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PERSISTENT_INVISIBILITY"		"1"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%bonus_ms"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS"	"%mres_reduction"
				}

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"				"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_TRUESIGHT_IMMUNE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"				"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_MUTED"					"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
			"modifier_otherworld_particle_thinker"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"1"
			
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_start_cast.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_customorigin"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"CASTER"	"follow_hitloc"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{
	"01"

			"duration"						"16"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_as"						"30 50 70"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_ar"						"200 400 600"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"						"750 875 1000"
		}
	"05"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"							"-40"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_superposition.vpcf"

		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dark_seer.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_superposition_particle_thinker"
				"Target" 		"POINT"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"superposition_start"
				"duration"		"%duration"
				"radius"		"%radius"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_superposition"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_superposition_buff"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_superposition"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"
			}
			"modifier_superposition_buff"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"

				}
			}
			"modifier_superposition_particle_thinker"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.2"

				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"superposition_check"
						"radius"		"%radius"
					}
				}

				"Aura"          	"modifier_superposition_slow"
				"Aura_Radius"   	"%radius"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "0"

				{
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_superposition.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"

							"01"	"%radius 0 0"
						}
					}
				}
			}

			}
		}

// BAAL: Superposition 2
//=====================================================================================================
"baal_superposition2"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_lua"
	"ScriptFile"					"lua/abilities/baal_superposition2"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_1"
	"AnimationPlaybackRate"			"0.8"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"baal_superposition"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"110 100 90"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"125"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"						"5.0 5.5 6.0"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_ms"						"10 15 20"
			"LinkedSpecialBonus"			"special_bonus_baal_4"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"mres_reduction"				"0"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_screen_effect.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_start_cast.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/hero_baal.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_otherworld_particle_thinker"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_otherworld"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"otherworld_cast"
				"cast"			"1"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_otherworld"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"

				"Priority" "MODIFIER_PRIORITY_ULTRA"

				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_ghost.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

				"EffectName"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_superposition2.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"		"attach_origin"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_screenspace"
					}
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_stop"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"otherworld_cast"
						"cast"			"0"
					}
					"CreateThinker"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_otherworld_particle_thinker"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ABSOLUTE_NO_DAMAGE_PHYSICAL" "1"
					//"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_INVISIBILITY_LEVEL"			"4"
					//"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PERSISTENT_INVISIBILITY"		"1"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%bonus_ms"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS"	"%mres_reduction"
				}

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"				"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_TRUESIGHT_IMMUNE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
			"modifier_otherworld_particle_thinker"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"1"
			
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_start_cast.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_customorigin"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"CASTER"	"follow_hitloc"
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
}//=====================================================================================================
// BAAL: Vector Plate
//=====================================================================================================
"baal_vector_plate"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_3"
	"AnimationPlaybackRate"			"0.95"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"baal_vector_plate"
	"AoERadius"						"100"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1000"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"16 12 8 4"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"25"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"						"50 80 110 140"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"push"							"475 550 625 700"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"						"100"
		}
	"05"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"							"-80"
		}
	"06"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow_duration"					"1"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_vector_plate.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_superposition_teleport.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dark_seer.vsndevts"
		}

	"OnAbilityPhaseStart"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_vector_plate_ignore_turn"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
			"Duration"		"0.3"
		}
	}

	"OnUpgrade"
	{
		"LevelUpAbility"
		{
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
			"AbilityName"	"baal_vector_plate_switch"
		}
	}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"vector_plate_start"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_vector_plate_particle_thinker"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/baal_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"vector_plate_check"
						"radius"		"%radius"
						"push"			"%push"
						"damage"		"%damage"
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_vector_plate_slow"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"Duration"			"%slow_duration"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"Damage"
					{
						"Target"		"TARGET"
						"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
						"Damage"		"%damage"
					}
				}
			
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%slow"
				}
			}

			"modifier_vector_plate_ignore_turn"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_IGNORE_CAST_ANGLE"	"1"
				}
			}
		}
}//=====================================================================================================

// BAAL: Vector Plate Switch
//=====================================================================================================
"baal_vector_plate_switch"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_TOGGLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"baal_vector_plate_switch"
	"MaxLevel"						"1"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"10"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_screen_effect.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_baal/baal_otherworld_start_cast.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dark_seer.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnToggleOn"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_vector_plate_dont_affect_baal"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
		}
	"OnToggleOff"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_vector_plate_dont_affect_baal"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_vector_plate_dont_affect_baal"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			}
		}
}//=====================================================================================================

// BAHAMUT: Mega Flare
//=====================================================================================================
"bahamut_mega_flare"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"bahamut_mega_flare"
	"AoERadius"						"400"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1500"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"110"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"230"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_inner"					"225 300 375"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius_inner"					"325"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_outer"					"175 225 275"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius_outer"					"550"
		}
	"05"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"speed"							"450"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_bahamut/mega_flare_2.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_phoenix.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_techies.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dark_seer.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/bahamut_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"MegaFlare"
				"damage"		"%damage_inner"
				"damage2"		"%damage_outer"
				"radius"		"%radius_inner"
				"radius2"		"%radius_outer"
				"speed"			"%speed"
			}

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@hero Balthasar
///@ability Firebolt
///@changes #
/// Cast range increased to 675 (was 575).
/// Cooldown reduced to 7s (was 14/13/12/11s).
/// Now deals damage over time equal to 10/20/30/40 + 20/30/40/50% of Balthasar's total attack damage.

			}

		}

			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}
	}

				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS" "%armor_reduction"

				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%move_slow"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%attack_slow"
				}
		}
	}
}

		"01"

			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"					"15"
		}

			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"

		}

		{
		"particle" "particles\units\heroes\hero_invoker\invoker_alacrity_buff.vpcf"

		}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "heroes/elementalist_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "elementalist_trinity"
			"duration" "%duration"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		"elementalist_trinity_effect_mod"
			{
			"IsHidden" "1"
			"IsBuff" "1"
			"IsPurgable" "0"
			"OnCreated"
				{
				"AttachEffect"
					{
					"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_invoker/invoker_alacrity.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"  "follow_overhead"
					"Target"            "TARGET"
					}
				}
			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_SILENCED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}
			}
		"elementalist_scepter_mod"
			{
			"IsHidden" "1"
			"IsBuff" "1"
			"IsPurgable" "0"
			"OnCreated"
				{
				"AttachEffect"
					{
					"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_invoker/invoker_alacrity.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"  "follow_overhead"
					"Target"            "TARGET"
					}
				}
			"Properties"
				{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS" "%bonus_scepter"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS" "%bonus_scepter"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS" "%bonus_scepter"
				}
			}
		}

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"

		}
	"02"

			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"attack_damage"					"45 60 75"
		}
	"03"

			"duration"						"5.0"
		}
	"04"

		}
	"05"

			"radius"						"450"
		}
	}

"elena_convoke"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"

	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"elena_convoke"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1250"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"22"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75 90 105 120"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"						"15 30 45 60" // to both health and mana
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"						"350 375 400 425"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"8"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"creep_heal"					"3 6 9 12"
		}
	"05"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"ally_heal"						"8 16 24 32"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/convoke_circle.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/elena_damage.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/elena_heal.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents\hero_phantom.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_convoke_aura"
				"Target" 		"POINT"
			}
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_convoke_aura_creep"
				"Target" 		"POINT"
			}
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_convoke_aura_ally"
				"Target" 		"POINT"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_convoke_aura"
			{
				"Duration" "%duration+0.95"
				"Aura"          	"modifier_convoke"
				"Aura_Radius"   	"%radius"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "0"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/convoke_circle.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
						"ControlPoints"
						{
							"01"	"%radius 0 0"
						}
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_convoke_aura_creep"
			{
				"Duration" "%duration+0.95"
				"Aura"          	"modifier_convoke_creep"
				"Aura_Radius"   	"%radius"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "0"
			}
			"modifier_convoke_aura_ally"
			{
				"Duration" "%duration+0.95"
				"Aura"          	"modifier_convoke_ally"
				"Aura_Radius"   	"%radius"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "1"
			}
			"modifier_convoke"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"

				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"

				{
					"Damage"
					{
						"Target"		"TARGET"

					}
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/elena_damage.vpcf"

						"Target"            "TARGET"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"TARGET"	"attach_origin"
							"TARGET"	"attach_origin"
						}
					}
					"Heal"
					{
						"Target"        "CASTER"
						"HealAmount"	"%damage"
					}
				}


			
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_DISABLE_HEALING" "1"
				}
			}

						}
					}

					}

"elena_convoke_2"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_BOTH"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"elena_convoke2"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"500"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.6s"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"6 5 4 3"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"70"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_per_convoke_stack"		"10 12 14 16" // deals half the damage to mana as well
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"max_damage"					"300 350 400 450" // deals half the damage to mana as well
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/elena_damage.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/elena_heal.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents\hero_phantom.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"convokeBlast"
				"damage"		"%damage_per_convoke_stack"
				"max_damage"	"%max_damage"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		}
}

//=====================================================================================================
// ELENA: Diverge
//=====================================================================================================
"elena_diverge"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"elena_diverge"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1000"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"70"

	"AbilityChannelTime"			"12.0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"200 300 400"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_reduction"				"-30 -40 -50"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"						"1000"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"return"						"45 60 75" // returns the percentage of damage taken BEFORE reductions
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"stack_duration"				"12" // returns the percentage of damage taken BEFORE reductions
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/elena_diverge_a.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_chen/chen_test_of_faith.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_chen.vsndevts"
		}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"elena_diverge_mod_efft"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"elena_modifier_channeling"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"divergeStart"
		}
		"SpendMana"
		{
			"Mana"		"0"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelFinish"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"divergeReset"
			"return"		"%return"
			"rds"			"%radius"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelInterrupted"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"divergeReset"
			"return"		"%return"
			"rds"			"%radius"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelSucceeded"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"divergeReset"
			"return"		"%return"
			"rds"			"%radius"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"elena_diverge_mod_efft"
			{
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"IsHidden" "1"
				"Aura"          	"elena_diverge_mod_aura"
				"Aura_Radius"   	"%radius"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "1"
			}
			"elena_diverge_mod_aura"
			{
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE" "%damage_reduction"
				}
				"OnTakeDamage"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"divergeCheck"
						"dmg"			"%attack_damage"
						"threshold"		"%threshold"
						"reduction"		"%damage_reduction"
						"return_damage"	"%return"
					}
				}
			}
			"elena_diverge_owner_mod"
			{
				"Duration" "%stack_duration"
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"divergeReset"
					}
				}
			}
			"elena_diverge_slow_mod"
			{
				"Duration" "2"
				"IsDebuff" "1"
				"IsHidden" "1"
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "-100"
				}
			}
			"elena_modifier_channeling"
		    {
		    	"IsHidden" "1"
		        "ThinkInterval" "1.0"
		        "OnIntervalThink"
		        {
		            // Looping Animation
		            "ApplyModifier"
		            {
		                "ModifierName"  "elena_channelling_animation"
		                "Target"        "CASTER"
		            }

		            "RunScript"
		            {
		            	"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
		            	"Function"		"divergeDeal"
		            }
		        }
		    }

		    "elena_channelling_animation"
		    {
		        "IsHidden" "1"
		        "Duration" "0.9"
		        "OverrideAnimation" "ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_1"
		    }
		}
}

	"01"

	"02"

			"radius"						"550"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"return"						"100" // returns the percentage of damage taken BEFORE reductions
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"stack_duration"				"16" // returns the percentage of damage taken BEFORE reductions
		}

			"Function"		"divergeStart"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"elena_diverge_mod_efft"
			{
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"IsHidden" "1"
				"Aura"          	"elena_diverge_mod_aura"

				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "1"
			}
			"elena_diverge_mod_aura"
			{
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE" "%damage_reduction"
				}
				"OnTakeDamage"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"divergeCheck"
						"dmg"			"%attack_damage"
						"threshold"		"%threshold"
						"reduction"		"%damage_reduction"
						"return_damage"	"%return"
					}
				}
			}
			"elena_diverge_owner_mod"

				"Duration" "%stack_duration"
				"IsBuff" "1"
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/elena_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"divergeReset"
					}
				}
			}
			"elena_diverge_slow_mod"
			{
				"Duration" "2"
				"IsDebuff" "1"
				"IsHidden" "1"

				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "-100"

		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"						"5.00"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"root_duration"					"1.0 1.40 1.8 2.2"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation_cast.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation_target.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation_complete.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_chen/chen_test_of_faith.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_chen.vsndevts"
		}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_meditation"
			"Target" 		"TARGET"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelFinish"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_meditation"
			"Target" 		"TARGET"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelInterrupted"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_meditation"
			"Target" 		"TARGET"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelSucceeded"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_meditation"
			"Target" 		"TARGET"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_meditation"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"Duration"			"%duration"

				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation_cast.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "CASTER"
					}
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation_target.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
					}
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_meditation_root"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
						"Duration"		"%root_duration"
					}
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_elena/meditation_complete.vpcf"

						"Target" "TARGET"
					}
				}
			
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%slow"

				}

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_PROVIDES_VISION" "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}

"example_ability"
{
	"ID"							"1852"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"holdout_blade_fury"

	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1000"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	"AbilityCooldown"				"10.0"
	"AbilityChannelTime"			"2.0 1.8 1.6 1.5"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"
	"AbilityDamage"					"400 600 800 1000"
	
	"precache"
	{
		"particle"					"particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"
		"soundfile"					"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_gyrocopter.vsndevts"
	}

	// Item Info
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"300"
	"SideShop"						"1"
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"Target"		"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
		}
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"		"Hero_Gyrocopter.CallDown.Fire"
			"Target"			"CASTER"
		}
	}
	
	"OnChannelSucceeded"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_channel_start"
		}
		"AttachEffect"
		{
			"EffectName"			"particles/econ/generic/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1/generic_aoe_explosion_sphere_1.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"		"follow_origin"
			"EffectRadius"			"%radius"
			"EffectDurationScale"	"1"
			"EffectLifeDurationScale" "1"

						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/fate_abilities.lua"

					}
				}

				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/fate_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"DoomsayerStart"
						"timer"			"%duration"
					}
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/fate_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"DoomsayerEnd"
						"respawn_time"	"%respawn_reduction"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_doomsayer_ally"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"

				"IsDebuff"			"1"

					}
				}

					"RunScript"
					{

						"Function"		"DoomsayerEnd"
						"respawn_time"	"%respawn_reduction"
					}

"faust_shockbolt"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAGS_NOT_ANCIENTS"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"fate_chains_of_fate"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"600"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"4.5 4.0 3.5 3.0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"80"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"dmg"							"4.0 4.5 5.0 5.5"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_fate/fate_chains_of_fate.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_fate/fate_chains_of_fate_buff.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_fate/fate_displace_debuff.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents\hero_fate.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/faust_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"shockbolt"
				"dmg"			"%dmg"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_chains_of_fate"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"1"
				"Duration"			"%duration"
			
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_fate/fate_chains_of_fate_buff.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_rootbone"

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/fate_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"ChainStop"
					}
				}

				"OnDeath"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/fate_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"ChainsOfFateDeath"
						"damage"		"%dmg"
						"creep_damage"	"%dmg_creep"
					}
				}
			}
		}
}//=====================================================================================================

				}
			}

				}
		}

		"Duration" "1"
		"IsHidden" "1"

				}
			}

		}

		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"armor_reduction"			"-1 -2 -3 -4"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"attack_speed_bonus_creep"	"5 10 15 20"
		}
		"07"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"attack_speed_bonus_hero"	"10 20 30 40"
		}
		"08"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"bonus_duration"			"4"
		}
	}
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"						"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_ursa.vsndevts"
		"particle"						"particles/units/heroes/hero_ursa/ursa_earthshock.vpcf"
	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"Target"					"CASTER"
			"EffectName"				"Hero_Ursa.Earthshock"
		}
	
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"Target"					"CASTER"
			"EffectName"				"particles/units/heroes/hero_ursa/ursa_earthshock.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"			"start_at_origin"
			"EffectRadius"				"%shock_radius"
		}

		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/fury_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"Terashock"
			"radius"		"%shock_radius"
		}
	
		"ActOnTargets"
		{
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"	"CASTER"
				"Radius"	"%shock_radius"
				"Teams"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Types"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
				"Flags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
			}
			
			"Action"
			{
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"	"TARGET"
					"Damage"	"%AbilityDamage"
					"Type"		"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
				}
				
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"TARGET"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_earthshock_debuff_datadriven"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_earthshock_debuff_datadriven"
		{
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsPurgable"		"1"
			"IsBuff"			"0"
			"IsDebuff"			"1"
			"IsStunDebuff"		"0"
			//Purge(bool RemovePositiveBuffs, bool RemoveDebuffs, bool BuffsCreatedThisFrameOnly, bool RemoveStuns, bool RemoveExceptions)
		
			"Duration"			"%slow_duration"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%movement_slow"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS"	"%armor_reduction"
			}
		}
		"modifier_terashock_attack_speed_hero"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%bonus_duration"

			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%attack_speed_bonus_hero"
			}

					}

						{
						"00" "0 0 100"

						}
					}
				"AttachEffect"
					{
					"EffectName" "particles/units/heroes/hero_enigma/enigma_blackhole_fallback_mid.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType" "follow_origin"
					"Target" "TARGET"

{
	// Cosmetic
	"modifier_chronosphere_tooltip_datadriven"
	{
		"IsDebuff"		"1"
		"IsPurgable"	"0"
	}

	"modifier_chronosphere_aura_datadriven"
	{
		"Duration"	"%duration"

		"OnCreated"
		{
			"AttachEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_faceless_void/faceless_void_chronosphere.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"
				"Target"		"TARGET"

				"ControlPoints"
				{
					"01"	"%radius %radius 0"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"ThinkInterval"		"%aura_interval"

		"OnIntervalThink"
		{
			"ActOnTargets"
			{
				"Target"
				{
					"Center"	"TARGET"
					"Types"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_ALL"
					"Teams"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_BOTH"
					"Radius"	"%radius"
				}

				"Action"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"		"heroes/gemini_abilities.lua"
						"Function"			"ChronosphereAura"
						"Target"			"TARGET"
						"aura_modifier"		"modifier_chronosphere_datadriven"
						"caster_modifier"	"modifier_chronosphere_caster_datadriven"
					}
				}
			}
		}

		"States"
		{
			"MODIFIER_STATE_INVULNERABLE" 	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_HEALTH_BAR" 	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"				
			"MODIFIER_STATE_NOT_ON_MINIMAP" "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			"MODIFIER_STATE_UNSELECTABLE" 	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
		}
	}

	"modifier_chronosphere_datadriven"
	{
		"IsHidden"	"1"
		"Duration"	"%aura_interval"

		"OnCreated"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_chronosphere_tooltip_datadriven"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}

		"OnDestroy"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_chronosphere_tooltip_datadriven"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}
	}

		"IsHidden"	"1"
		"Duration"	"%aura_interval * 2"
	}
}

	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
	"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PHYSICAL"
	"AnimationPlaybackRate"			"2.25"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"sniper_assassinate"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.75"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"base_damage"				"30 40 50 60"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"					"12"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"range"						"1600"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"shot_speed_scepter"		"4000"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"range_scepter"				"2000"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"mult"						"0.50 0.60 0.70 0.80"
		}
		"07"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"mult_scepter"				"2.00"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"soundfile" "soundevents\game_sounds_heroes\game_sounds_sniper.vsndevts"
		}
	"OnUpgrade"
		{
		"LevelUpAbility"
			{
			"Target" "CASTER"
			"AbilityName" "hawkeye_double_tap_visuals"
			}
		"LevelUpAbility"
			{
			"Target" "CASTER"
			"AbilityName" "hawkeye_double_tap_second_shot"
			}
		}
		
	"OnAbilityPhaseStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"EffectName"			"Ability.AssassinateLoad"
		}
	}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "heroes/hawkeye_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "hawkeye_double_tap"
			"mult" "%mult"
			"mult_scepter" "%mult_scepter"
			}
		"FireSound"
			{
			"Target"				"CASTER"
			"EffectName"			"Ability.Assassinate"
			}
		"FireSound"
			{
			"Target" "CASTER"
			"EffectName"			"Hero_Sniper.AssassinateProjectile"
			}
		}
	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "heroes/hawkeye_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "hawkeye_double_tap_hit"
			"mult" "%mult"
			}
		"FireSound"
			{
			"Target"
						{
						"Center" "TARGET"
						"Flags" "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_DEAD"	
						}
			"EffectName"			"Hero_Sniper.AssassinateDamage"
			}
		"DeleteOnHit" "0"
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{		
		"hawkeye_double_tap_second_shot_effect_mod"
			{
			"Duration" "8"
			"IsBuff" "1"
			"OnDestroy"
				{
				"RunScript"
					{
					"ScriptFile" "heroes/hawkeye_abilities.lua"
					"Function" "hawkeye_double_tap_reset"
					}
				}
			}
		}
}

			"ModifierName"	"modifier_stop_commands"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}

		}

//=====================================================================================================
// HERO: Freedom Strike
//=====================================================================================================

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@hero Hero
///@ability Freedom Strike
///@changes #
/// Increased slow to 25%.
/// Rescaled slow duration to 2.0/2.5/3.0/3.5s
/// Reduced cooldown to 5s (was 12/10/8/6s).
/// Reduced Mana cost to 55.
/// Increased radius to 275 (was 250).
/// Now slows attack speed by 100.

"hero_freedom_strike"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_lua"
	"ScriptFile"					"lua/abilities/hero_freedom_strike"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DIRECTIONAL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_SPAWN"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"hero_freedom_strike"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"475"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.15"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"5"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"55"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{

				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/horror_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"deathmark_tick"
				}
			}
		
			"OnAttacked"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/horror_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"deathmark_activate"
					"damage"		"%damage"
				}
			}
		}

		"modifier_deathmarksilence"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsDebuff"			"1"
			"IsPurgable"		"1"
		
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_horror/horror_deathmark_effect.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"

			"Properties"
			{
			    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%movement_slow" 
			}
		
			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_SILENCED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}
		}
	}
}

	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AnimationPlaybackRate"			"2"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"horror_shadowclone"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"20"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"70"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"illusion_duration"		"6 9 12 15"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"illusion_damage"		"-50 -45 -40 -35"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"illusion_incoming"		"225"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"illusion_bonus_attack_speed" "15 20 25 30"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"illusion_bonus_move_speed" "10 20 30 40"
		}
		
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"					"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_kunkka.vsndevts"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_horror/horror_shadowclone.vpcf"


	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/horror_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"horror_shadowclone"
		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_shadowclone"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%illusion_duration-0.1"

			"OnDealDamage"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/horror_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"track_damage"
					"attack_damage" "%attack_damage"
				}
			}

			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/horror_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"reverse"
				}
			}

			"Properties"
			{
			    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%illusion_bonus_move_speed"
			}

			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}
		}
		"modifier_shadowclone_regen"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"2"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT" "0.5"
			}
		}
	}
}

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"60"
	"HasScepterUpgrade"				"1"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"120"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"int_red"						"-1"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"mana_burn"						"10 20 30 40"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"						"24"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_ironfist/ironfist_weakpoint_blue.vpcf"
		}
		
	"OnUpgrade"
		{
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "heroes/ironfist_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "ironfist_focus_level_sync"
			}
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"FireSound"
			{
			"EffectName" "Hero_Axe.Battle_Hunger"
			"Target" "TARGET"
			}
		"ApplyModifier"
			{
			"ModifierName" "ironfist_focus_blue_mod"
			"Target" "TARGET"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		"ironfist_focus_blue_mod"
			{
			"EffectName" "particles/units/heroes/hero_ironfist/ironfist_weakpoint_blue.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType" "follow_overhead"
			"Duration" "%duration"
			"OnCreated"
				{
				"RunScript"
					{
					"ScriptFile" "heroes/ironfist_abilities.lua"
					"Function" "ironfist_focus_increase"
					"red" "0"
					"blue" "1"
					"green" "0"
					"mana_burn" "0"
					"startup" "1"
					}
				}
			"OnAttacked"
				{
				"RunScript"
					{
					"ScriptFile" "heroes/ironfist_abilities.lua"
					"Function" "ironfist_focus_increase"
					"red" "0"
					"blue" "1"
					"green" "0"
					"mana_burn" "%mana_burn"
					}
				}
			"Properties"
				{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS" "%int_red"
				}
			}
		}
}

	// Damage
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"movespeed"						"522"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"						"250"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"						"2"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_ironfist/hissatsu.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_nyx_assassin.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"FireSound"
			{
			"EffectName" "Hero_NyxAssassin.Vendetta"
			"Target" "CASTER"
			}
		"ApplyModifier"
			{
			"ModifierName" "modifier_invisible"
			"Target" "CASTER"
			"Duration" "%duration"
			}
		"ApplyModifier"
			{
			"ModifierName" "ironfist_windwalk_movespeed"
			"Target" "CASTER"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		"ironfist_windwalk_movespeed"
			{
			"Duration" "%duration"
			"IsHidden" "1"
			"OnCreated"
				{
					"CreateThinker"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_windwalk_fx"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
					"Damage"
					{
						"Target"
						{
							"Center"  	"TARGET"
							"Radius" 	"%radius"
							"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
							"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
						}
						"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
						"Damage"		"%AbilityDamage"
					}
				}
			"OnAbilityExecuted"
				{
				"RemoveModifier"
					{
					"ModifierName" "ironfist_windwalk_movespeed"
					"Target" "TARGET"
					}
				}
			"OnAttackLanded"
				{
				"RemoveModifier"
					{
					"ModifierName" "ironfist_windwalk_movespeed"
					"Target" "TARGET"
					}
				}
			"Properties"
				{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_ABSOLUTE" "%movespeed"
				}
			}
		"modifier_windwalk_fx"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"1"
		
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"AttachEffect"
					{
						"Target"			"TARGET"
						"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_ironfist/hissatsu.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"start_at_origin"
					}
			}
		
		}
		}
}

		}

	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_bloodseeker_thirst_speed"

		}

		}
	}

				}

	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"TrackingProjectile"

			"Target"           "TARGET"
		    "EffectName"       "particles/econ/items/phantom_assassin/phantom_assassin_arcana_elder_smith/phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger_arcana.vpcf"

		}

		}

		{
		"modifier_spawned_in_last_frame"
			{
				"Passive" "1"
				"IsHidden" "1"
				"Duration" "0.03"

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_spawned_in_last_frame"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
					"RemoveAbility"
					{
						"AbilityName" "main_just_spawned"
						"Target" "TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
		}

"mana_knight_vorpal_assault2"
// 
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"mana_knight_vorpal_assault"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"150"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"80"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"150"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"base_damage"				"100 150 200" // deals this much extra Magical damage on his attack
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"mana_drain"				"15 20 25" // drains this much Max Mana for the attack, and deals damage equal to the amount drained
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"						"-50"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"slow_duration"				"1"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_mana_knight/vorpal_assault_strike.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_mana_knight/vorpal_assault_unit_buffs.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_razor.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_underlord.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_brewmaster.vsndevts"
		}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/mk_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"VorpalAssault"
			"amount"		"%attacks"
		}
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"	"ManaKnight.VorpalAssault.Start"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}
	}

	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
	{
		"DeleteOnHit"	"0"
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_vorpal_assault"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"

				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_mana_knight/vorpal_assault_unit_buffs.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"
			}
			"modifier_vorpal_assault_prehit"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"OnAttackStart"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_vorpal_assault_onhit"
						"Target" 		"ATTACKER"
					}
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_mana_knight/vorpal_assault_strike.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "ATTACKER"
					}
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Brewmaster.Brawler.Crit"
						"Target" 		"ATTACKER"
					}
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_razor.lightning"
						"Target" 		"ATTACKER"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_vorpal_assault_onhit"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/mk_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"VorpalAssaultStrike"
						"damage"		"%bonus_damage"
						"mana_damage"	"%mana_damage"
						"ATTACKER"		"ATTACKER"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_vorpal_assault_attackspeed"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%bonus_attackspeed"
				}
			}
		}
}

					}
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_mifune_ouichi_slash"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
				}	
			}

"multiteam_example_ability"
  {
    "ID"              "1856"
    "AbilityBehavior"       "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
    "BaseClass"           "ability_datadriven"
    "AbilityTextureName"      "nyx_assassin_mana_burn"

    // Stats
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"        "1000"
    "AbilityCastPoint"        "0.0"
    "AbilityCooldown"       "4.0"
    //"AbilityChannelTime"      "2.0 1.8 1.6 1.5"
    "AbilityUnitDamageType"     "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
    "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_BOTH"
    "AbilityUnitTargetType"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
    "AbilityCastAnimation"      "ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"
    "AbilityDamage"         "400 600 800 1000"
    
    "precache"
    {
      "particle_folder"        "particles/test_particle"
      "particle_folder"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_pugna"
      "soundfile"	           "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_gyrocopter.vsndevts"
    }

    // Item Info
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"       "300"
    
    "OnSpellStart"
    {
      "RunScript"
      {
        "ScriptFile"      "scripts/vscripts/multiteam.lua"
        "Function"        "MTAction"
        "Target"          "TARGET"
        "Team"            "ENEMY|NOSELF"  // DEFAULT
        //  OPTIONS
        //  "ENEMY", "ALLY", "TEAM", "NOTEAM", "SELF", "NOSELF"
        "KVCallback"      "OnChannelFinish" // DEFAULT
      }
    }
    
    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
      "AttachEffect"
      {
        "EffectName"      "particles/units/heroes/hero_pugna/pugna_netherblast.vpcf"
        "EffectAttachType"    "follow_origin"
        "EffectRadius"      "250"
        "EffectDurationScale" "1"
        "EffectLifeDurationScale" "1"
        "Target"      "TARGET"
      }
      
      "Damage"
      {
        "Type"          "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
        "Damage"        "%damage"
        "Target"        "TARGET"
      }
      
      "Knockback"
      {
        "Center"  "CASTER"
        "Target"  "TARGET"
        "Duration"  "0.5"
        "Distance"  "300"
        "Height"  "300"
      }
      
      "FireSound"
      {
        "EffectName"    "Hero_Gyrocopter.CallDown.Damage"
        "Target"      "CASTER"
      }
    }
    
    // Special  
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
      "01"
      {
        "var_type"        "FIELD_INTEGER"
        "damage"        "400 600 800 1000"
      }
    }
  }

		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_nu/antimatter.vpcf"

		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_antimatter_mines_passive"
			{
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"

				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/nu_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"antimatter_mines_check"
						"check_radius"	"%check_radius"
						"delay"			"%explosion_delay"

					}
				}
			}
		}

    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "BaseClass"             "ability_datadriven"

    "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
    //"AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL" 
    "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
    "FightRecapLevel"               "1"
    "AoERadius"                     "%radius"
    "AbilityCastAnimation"          "ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"
    "AnimationPlaybackRate"         "1"
    "AbilityTextureName"            "odin_gods_eye"

    // Precache
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    {
        "soundfile"         "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_mirana.vsndevts"
