    }
    
    // Casting
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"              "3000"
    "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.5"

    // Time     
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCooldown"               "30"
    "AbilityDuration"               "3.11 3.11 3.11 3.11"

    // Damage.
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityDamage"                 "15 17 19 21"

    // Cost
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"               "75"

    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "true_sight"        "1 1 1 1"
        }
        "02"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
            "duration"          "3 3.5 4 4.5"
        }
        "03"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "radius"            "450"
        }
        "04"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "bonus_movespeed"   "-15"
        }
    }

    "OnSpellStart"
    {
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"            "heroes/odin_abilities.lua"
            "Function"              "GodEye"
            "true_sight"            "%true_sight"
            "duration"              "%duration"
            "radius"                "%radius"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers"
    {
        "modifier_godseye_aura"
        {
            "Passive"            "0"
            "IsHidden"            "1"
            "IsDebuff"            "0"
        
            "Aura"              "modifier_godseye_speed_bonus"
            "Aura_Radius"       "%radius"
            "Aura_Teams"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
            "Aura_Types"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
        }

        "modifier_godseye_truesight"
        {
            "Passive"            "0"
            "IsHidden"            "1"
            "IsDebuff"            "0"
        
            "Aura"              "modifier_truesight"
            "Aura_Radius"       "%radius"
            "Aura_Teams"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
            "Aura_Types"        "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
        }

        "modifier_godseye_speed_bonus"
        {
            "Passive"            "0"
            "IsHidden"            "0"
            "IsDebuff"            "1"

            "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_abaddon/abaddon_frost_buff.vpcf"

            "ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
            "OnIntervalThink"
            {
                "RunScript"
                {
                    "ScriptFile"    "heroes/odin_abilities.lua"
                    "Function"        "CheckInvisible"
                }   
            }
        
            "Properties"
            {
                "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%bonus_movespeed"
            }
        }

        "modifier_godseye_invis_punish"
        {
            "Passive"            "0"
            "Duration"           "1"
            "IsHidden"            "0"
            "IsDebuff"            "1"

            "ThinkInterval"  "0.5"
            "OnIntervalThink"
            {
                "FireEffect"
                {
                    "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_odin/gods_eye_damage.vpcf"
                    "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"

                    "ControlPointEntities"
                    {
                        "TARGET"    "follow_hitloc"
                    }
                }
                "Damage"
                {
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                    "Type"            "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
                    "Damage"        "%AbilityDamage"
                }
            }

            {
                "MODIFIER_STATE_SILENCED"        "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"

            }
        }
    }

            "Passive"           "1"
            "IsHidden"          "1"
            "IsBuff"            "1"

                    "ScriptFile"    "heroes/odin_abilities.lua"

                }

        }

            }
        }

    }

            "EffectAttachType"    "follow_hitloc"

            "OnAttackLanded"
            // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
            {
                "RemoveModifier"
                {
                    "ModifierName"    "modifier_sleipnir"
                    "Target"         "CASTER"
                }
            }
        
            "Properties"
            {
                "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "45"
            }

            "States"
            {
                "MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"        "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
            }
        }
        "modifier_sleipnir_damage"
        {
            "Passive"            "0"
            "IsHidden"            "1"
            "IsDebuff"            "1"
        
            "OnCreated"
            {
                "Damage"
                {
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                    "Type"            "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
                    "Damage"        "%AbilityDamage"
                }
                "FireEffect"
                {
                    "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_odin/odin_sleipnirs_veil_damage.vpcf"
                    "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
                    "Target"            "TARGET"
                }
            }

            "Properties"
            {
                "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%slow"
            }
        }
    }

}

// SANGUINE HUNTER: Bloodcall

"sanguine_hunter_bloodcall"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_BOTH"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"	
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"2"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"sanguine_hunter_bloodcall"

	// Precache
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_invoker.vsndevts"
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_life_stealer.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_life_stealer/life_stealer_open_wounds.vpcf"
	}
	
	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1600"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3 0.3 0.3"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"60"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// Modifier just delays damage
	
	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"consume"					"50"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"amount"					"12 14 16"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"					"10"
		}
	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"bloodcall_start"
			"consume"		"%consume"
			"pct"			"%amount"
			"duration"		"%duration"
		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_bloodcall_ally_heal"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
		
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_life_stealer/life_stealer_open_wounds.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT" "1"
			}
		}
		"modifier_bloodcall_enemy_hurt"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"0"
			"IsDebuff"			"1"
		
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_life_stealer/life_stealer_open_wounds.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
		
			"ThinkInterval"  "1"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"bloodcall_damage"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

// SANGUINE HUNTER: LIFELINK

"sanguine_hunter_lifelink"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_BOTH"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ALLIES_YES"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"sanguine_hunter_lifelink"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1200"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.452 0.452 0.452 0.452"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"20"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"50"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"				"20"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"heal_from_target"		"10 20 30 40"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"heal_damage_to_target"	"10 20 30 40"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_meepo.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_sanguine_hunter/sanguine_hunter_lifelink.vpcf"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_skywrath_mage/skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_silence.vpcf"
	}

	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"sanguine_heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"lifelink_start"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		"modifier_lifelink_ally"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_sanguine_hunter/sanguine_hunter_lifelink.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_hitloc"
		
			"OnDealDamage"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"lifelink_deal"
					"dmg"			"%attack_damage"
					"heal"			"%heal_from_target"
				}
			}	
		}
		"modifier_lifelink_caster"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_sanguine_hunter/sanguine_hunter_lifelink.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_hitloc"
		
			"OnTakeDamage"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"lifelink_take"
					"dmg"			"%attack_damage"
					"heal"			"%heal_damage_to_target"
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_lifelink_enemy"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_sanguine_hunter/sanguine_hunter_lifelink.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_hitloc"
		
			"OnDealDamage"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"lifelink_deal"
					"dmg"			"%attack_damage"
					"heal"			"%heal_from_target"
				}
			}
		}
		}
}

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"regen"					"2 4 6 8"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"threshold"				"50"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"				"900"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"lifesteal"				"25 30 35 40"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"movespeed"				"7 8 9 10"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"				"15 20 25 30"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_skywrath_mage.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_skywrath_mage/skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_debuff_rune.vpcf"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_skywrath_mage/skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_silence.vpcf"
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		"modifier_sadistic"
		{
			"Passive"			"1"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
		
			"ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"sadistic_check"
					"threshold"		"%threshold"
					"radius"		"%radius"
				}
			}

			"OnAttackLanded"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"sadistic_attack"
					"threshold"		"%threshold"
					"lifesteal"		"%lifesteal"
					"dmg"			"%attack_damage"
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_sadistic_regen"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%movespeed"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEATTACK_BONUSDAMAGE" "%damage"
			}
		}
		"modifier_sadistic_regen_timer"
		{
			"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"sadistic_pop"
				}
			}
		}
		}
}

		"particle"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_sanguine_hunter/sanguine_hunter_soul_claw_hit.vpcf"
	}

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"

	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"12"
	
	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"50 60 70 80"
	
	// Special	
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage_per_ten_percent" "25 35 45 55"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow_per_ten_percent" 	"50"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration" 				"12"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"heal" 					"20 25 30 35"
		}
	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_soul_claw_charge_up"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
		}
	}

	"OnChannelFinish"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"soul_claw_charge_end"
		}
	}

	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_soul_claw_charge_up"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
			"ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"consume_health"
					"dmg"			"%damage_per_ten_percent"
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_soul_claw_damage_bonus"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE" "1"
			}

			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_CANNOT_MISS"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			}

			"OnAttackLanded"
			// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"sanguine_heroes/hunter_abilities.lua"
					"Function"		"soul_claw_hit"
					"steal"			"%heal"
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_soul_claw_damage_bonus_show_eff"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsBuff"			"1"
			"IsDebuff"			"0"
			"Duration"			"%duration"
		
		}
		"modifier_soul_claw_slow"
		{
			"Passive"			"0"
			"IsHidden"			"0"
			"IsDebuff"			"1"
			"Duration"			"4"
		
			"Properties"
			{
			    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "-50"
			}

                    {

                    }
                }

                        "Target"         "TARGET"
                    }
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"    "modifier_sentinel_armor_reduction_show"

                }

                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS" "%armor_reduction"
                }
            }
            "modifier_sentinel_armor_reduction_show"

                "Duration" "10"
                "IsDebuff" "1"
            }

    "AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
    "AbilityTextureName"            "tinker_heat_seeking_missile"
    "MaxLevel"                      "1"

    // Casting
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"              "0"
    "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.0"
    
    // Time     
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCooldown"               "0"

    "AbilityDamage"                 "160"

    // Cost
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"               "0"
    
    // Stats
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityModifierSupportValue"   "0.0"   // All about the damage

    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type"            "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "bonus_armor"            "15"
        }
    }
    
    "precache"
        {
        "particle" "particles\units\heroes\hero_tinker\tinker_missile.vpcf"
        "particle" "particles\units\heroes\hero_tinker\tinker_missle_explosion.vpcf"
        "soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_tinker.vsndevts"
        }

        "OnProjectileHitUnit"
        {
            "DeleteOnHit"    "1"
            "FireSound"
            {
                "Target"            "TARGET"
                "EffectName"        "Hero_Tinker.Heat-Seeking_Missile.Impact"
            }
        
            "FireEffect"
            {
                "Target"            "TARGET"
                "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_tinker/tinker_missle_explosion.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"  "start_at_customorigin"
                "ControlPointEntities"
                {
                    "TARGET"        "attach_origin"
                }
            }
            "Damage"
            {
                "Target"
                {
                    "Center"      "TARGET"
                    "Teams"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
                    "Types"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
                }
                "Type"            "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
                "Damage"        "%AbilityDamage"
            }
        }
    
    "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_sentinel_rockets"
            {
                "Passive" "1"
                "IsHidden" "1"
                "OnAttackStart"
                // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
                {
                    "Random"
                    {
                        "PseudoRandom" "DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_JUGG_CRIT"
                        "Chance"            "10"
                        "OnSuccess"
                        {
                            "FireSound"
                            {
                                "Target"            "CASTER"
                                "EffectName"        "Hero_Tinker.Heat-Seeking_Missile"
                            }
                            "TrackingProjectile"
                            {
                                "Target"            "TARGET"
                                "EffectName"        "particles\units\heroes\hero_tinker\tinker_missile.vpcf"
                                "Dodgeable"         "1"
                                "ProvidesVision"    "0"
                                "VisionRadius"        "0"
                                "MoveSpeed"            "800"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    
                }
            }
        }
}

// SET: Sands of War
//=====================================================================================================
"set_sands_of_war"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_lua"
	"ScriptFile"			"lua/abilities/set_sands_of_war"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT"	
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_ATTACK"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"set_sands_of_war"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"725"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"8"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"95 100 105 110"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"				"40 60 80 100"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"					"25"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"miss"					"20 30 40 50"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"				"2"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"				"150"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"time"					"16"
		}
		"07"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"range"					"700"
		}
		"08"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"mult"					"0.50"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_morphling.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_set/set_sand_wave_projectile.vpcf"
	}
}
//=====================================================================================================
// SET: Sand Puppet
//=====================================================================================================
"set_sand_puppet_archer"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"bloodseeker_thirst"
	"MaxLevel"						"8"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"range_bonus"			"75 100 125 150 175 200 225 250"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_skywrath_mage.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_skywrath_mage/skywrath_mage_ancient_seal_debuff_rune.vpcf"
		"particle"			"particles/status_fx/status_effect_phantom_lancer_illusion.vpcf"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_phantom_lancer/phantom_lancer_death.vpcf"
	}	
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_sand_puppet_archer"
			{
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERSISTENT"
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_phantom_lancer_illusion.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

				"OnDeath"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/set_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"Dust"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACK_RANGE_BONUS" "%range"
				}
			}
		}
}
//=====================================================================================================
// SET: Sand Puppet
//=====================================================================================================
"set_sand_puppet_warrior"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"bloodseeker_thirst"
	"MaxLevel"						"8"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"					"-4 -6 -8 -10 -12 -14 -16 -18"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"slow_duration"			"1"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"movespeed_bonus"		"5 10 15 20 25 30 35 40"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_skywrath_mage.vsndevts"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_meepo/meepo_geostrike.vpcf"
		"particle"			"particles/status_fx/status_effect_phantom_lancer_illusion.vpcf"
		"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_phantom_lancer/phantom_lancer_death.vpcf"
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_sand_puppet_warrior"
			{
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERSISTENT"
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"StatusEffectName" 		"particles/status_fx/status_effect_phantom_lancer_illusion.vpcf"
				"StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_sand_puppet_slow"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}

				"OnDeath"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/set_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"Dust"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%movespeed_bonus"
				}
			}

			"modifier_sand_puppet_slow"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"Duration"			"%slow_duration"
			
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_meepo/meepo_geostrike.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
			
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%slow"
				}

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_BLOCK_DISABLED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
		}
}
//=====================================================================================================
// SET: scarab_curse
//=====================================================================================================

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@hero Set
///@ability Scarab Curse
///@changes #
/// Increased base damage to 15/20/25/30.
/// Increased damage steal to 12/20/28/36%.
/// The total damage stolen is now the base damage steal plus the percentage damage steal.

"set_scarab_curse"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"				"ability_lua"
	"ScriptFile"			"lua/abilities/set_scarab_curse"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"	
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"set_scarab_curse"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"700"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"20"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"100"

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"base_damage" 			"15 20 25 30"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"percent_damage_reduction" "12 20 28 36"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow" 					"15"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"interval"				"0.9"
			"LinkedSpecialBonus"	"special_bonus_set_4"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"				"8"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"retarget_range"		"700"
		}
	}

	"precache"
	{
		"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_set/scarab_curse_ring.vpcf"
		"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_set/scarab_curse_flash.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/hero_set.vsndevts"
	}
}

//=====================================================================================================
// SHADE: Dark_hunger
//=====================================================================================================

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@type HERO_ABILITY
///@hero Shade
///@ability Dark Hunger
///@changes #
/// Dark Hunger is now an activated ability that causes Shade to drain Health from enemies around him, with the total drain amount increasing with each subsequent hit on an identical enemy.

"shade_dark_hunger"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_lua"
	"ScriptFile"					"lua/abilities/shade_dark_hunger"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"shade_dark_hunger"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"325"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.2"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"19"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"110"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"health_drain"				"20 35 50 65"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"					"6.00"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"interval"					"0.25"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"					"350"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles\units\heroes\hero_viper\viper_poison_debuff.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_doom_bringer/doom_bringer_lvl_death.vpcf"
		}
}//=====================================================================================================
// SHADE: Isolation

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"					"4 5 6"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"					"100"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"damage_reduction"			"60"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"					"750"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"slow"						"25"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"soundfile" "soundevents/hero_shade.vsndevts"

		"particle" "particles/status_fx/status_effect_medusa_stone_gaze_backup.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_bounty_hunter/bounty_hunter_jinda_slow.vpcf"

		"particle" "particles\items_fx\ethereal_blade.vpcf"
		}
}

// SHADE: Isolation
//=====================================================================================================
"shade_isolation_old"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NOT_ANCIENTS"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PHYSICAL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"shade_isolation"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_ATTACK"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"125"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.55"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"50"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"100"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
		"01"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"basedamage"				"250 360 470"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"decrease_unit"				"25"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"silence_duration"			"5"
		}
		"04"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"isolation_bonus"			"12 16 20"
		}
		"05"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"vision"					"80"
		}
		"06"
		{
			"var_type"					"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"check_radius"				"400"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"soundfile" "soundevents/hero_shade.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_bounty_hunter.vsndevts"
		"particle" "particles\units\heroes\hero_night_stalker\nightstalker_ulti.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_bounty_hunter/bounty_hunter_jinda_slow.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_shade/isolation_debuff.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_shade/precast_isolation.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles\items_fx\ethereal_blade.vpcf"
		}

	"OnAbilityPhaseStart"
	{
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_shade/precast_isolation.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
			"Target"            "CASTER"
		}
	}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "heroes/shade_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "shade_isolation"
			"dmg" "%basedamage"
			"decrease" "%decrease_unit"
			"isolation_bonus" "%isolation_bonus"
			"duration" "%silence_duration"
			"radius" "%check_radius"
			}
		"FireEffect"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_bounty_hunter/bounty_hunter_jinda_slow.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_hitloc"
				"Target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}
		
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_isolation"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"

				"EffectName" "particles/units/heroes/hero_shade/isolation_debuff.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType" "attach_origin"
			
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_BLIND"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
		}
}
//=====================================================================================================
// SHADE: Venomous
//=====================================================================================================

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@hero Shade
///@ability Venomous
///@changes #
/// Reworked into Shadowshift: Shade becomes Untargetable and moves faster for a short time, dodging projectiles on cast.

"shade_shadowshift"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_lua"
	"ScriptFile"					"lua/abilities/shade_shadowshift"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_MOVEMENT"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"shade_venomous_dark"

	// Casting

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@hero Shade
///@ability Stalk
///@changes #
/// Stalk now applies a 4.0s debuff, on attack, that slows by 30/40/50/60% and deals 20/30/40/50 Physical damage per second in 0.5s intervals.
/// Damage type changed to Physical (was Pure).
/// Cast range increased to 1100.
/// Cooldown increased to 12s (was 8s).
/// On-hit damage rescaled to 40/80/120/160 (was 25/75/125/175).
/// Movement speed bonus increased to 12/20/28/36%.
/// Movement speed slow reduced to 12%.
/// Duration increased to 6.0s.

	"AbilityTextureName"			"shadowmender_black_coil"

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"710"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"12"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75"
	
	// Dmge
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityDamage"					"80 120 160 200"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"damage_per_missing_health_percent"					"1 1.5 2 2.5"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/items2_fx/hand_of_midas.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_items.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
		"TrackingProjectile"
			{
			"Target"           	"TARGET"
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_vengeful/vengeful_magic_missle.vpcf"
			"Dodgeable"			"1"
			"ProvidesVision"	"0"
			"MoveSpeed"        	"1400"
			"SourceAttachment"	"DOTA_PROJECTILE_ATTACHMENT_ATTACK_1"
			}
		}
	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
		"Damage"
			{
			"Damage" "%AbilityDamage"
			"Target" "TARGET"
			"Type" "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
			}
		"RunScript"
			{
			"ScriptFile" "heroes/shadowmender_abilities.lua"
			"Function" "shadowmender_black_coil_check"
			"dmg" "%damage_per_missing_health_percent"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
		}
}

		}
	}

"summoner_build_cloaking_field_gen"
{
    // General
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "BaseClass" "ability_datadriven"
    "AbilityBehavior" "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
    "AbilityTextureName" "summoner_cloak"
    "MaxLevel" "4"

    // Stats
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange" "125"
    "AbilityCastPoint" "0.0"
    "AbilityCooldown" "90 80 70 60"
    "AbilityManaCost" "175 150 125 100"
    "AbilityChannelTime" "4 3.75 3.5 3.25"   // This sets the max time the spell can be channeled

    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type" "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "damage" "25"
        }
    }

    "precache"
    {
        "particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/build.vpcf"
        "soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_HERO.vsndevts"
    }

    // Data Driven
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "OnSpellStart"
    {
        "ApplyModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "build"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelInterrupted"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelSucceeded"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "summon_vassal"
            "vassal"        "6"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers" 
    { 
        "modifier_build" 
        {
            "IsDebuff" "1"
        }
    }
}"summoner_build_force_field_gen"

            "vassal"        "5"

            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }

            "IsDebuff" "1"
        }

        "modifier_build" 
        {
            "IsDebuff" "1"
        }
    }
}"summoner_build_tesla_coil"
{
    // General
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "BaseClass" "ability_datadriven"
    "AbilityBehavior" "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
    "AbilityUnitDamageType" "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
    "AbilityTextureName" "summoner_tesla"
    "MaxLevel" "4"

    // Stats
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange" "125"
    "AbilityCastPoint" "0.0"
    "AbilityCooldown" "20 18 16 14"
    "AbilityManaCost" "75 100 125 150"
    "AbilityChannelTime" "2 1.75 1.5 1.25"   // This sets the max time the spell can be channeled

    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type"                      "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "slow_tooltip"                  "-5 -10 -15 -20"
        }
        "02"
        {
            "var_type"                      "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "damage_tooltip"                "10 15 20 25"
        }
    }

    "precache"
    {
        "particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/build.vpcf"
        "soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_HERO.vsndevts"
    }

    // Data Driven
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "OnSpellStart"
    {
        "ApplyModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "build"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelInterrupted"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelSucceeded"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "summon_vassal"
            "vassal"        "7"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers" 
    { 
        "modifier_build" 
        {
            "IsDebuff" "1"
        }
    }

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	{
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/cloaking_field.vpcf"

		}

			"modifier_cloak"
			{

				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"IsStunDebuff"		"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/cloaking_field.vpcf"
				//Purge(bool RemovePositiveBuffs, bool RemoveDebuffs, bool BuffsCreatedThisFrameOnly, bool RemoveStuns, bool RemoveExceptions)

				"Aura_Radius"   	"500"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "0"
				"ThinkInterval"  "29.9"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_cloak"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_cloak_now"
			{
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				"IsBuff"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"IsStunDebuff"		"0"
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/cloaked.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_overhead"

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
		}

"summoner_nanobots"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_1"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"summoner_nanobots"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"575"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"17 16 15 14"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"damage"						"6 12 24 32"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"armor"							"-1.0"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"8"
		}
	"04"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"initial_damage"				"40 60 80 100"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/nanobots_target.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/nanobots_model.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/hero_vulcan.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"TrackingProjectile"
			{
				"Target"           	"TARGET"
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/nanobots_target.vpcf"
				"Dodgeable"			"1"
				"ProvidesVision"	"0"
				"VisionRadius"		"0"
				"MoveSpeed"        	"650"
				"SourceAttachment"	"DOTA_PROJECTILE_ATTACHMENT_ATTACK_1"
			}
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Vulcan.Nanobots"
				"Target"	"CASTER"
			}
		}

	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
	{
		"DeleteOnHit"	"1"
		"FireSound"
        {
        	"EffectName"	"Vulcan.Nanobots.Hit"
        	"Target"		"TARGET"
        }
		"Damage"
		{
			"Target"		"TARGET"
			"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PHYSICAL"
			"Damage"		"%initial_damage"
		}
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_nanobots"
			"Target" 		"TARGET"
			"Duration"		"%duration"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_nanobots"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
			
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/nanobots_model.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_hitloc"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"nanobots"
					}
				}

				"ThinkInterval"		"1"

				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"nanobots"
					}
					"Damage"
					{
						"Target"		"TARGET"
						"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PHYSICAL"
						"Damage"		"%damage"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS" "%armor"
				}
			}
		}
}

// SUMMONER: Short Range Teleport

"summoner_short_range_teleport"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_3"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"summoner_short_range_teleport"
	"AoERadius"						"%radius"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"1600 1800 2000 2200"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.35"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"25 "

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"50"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"delay"							"2.00"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"radius"						"250 300 350 400"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"range_tooltip"					"1600 1800 2000 2200"
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/teleport_chargeup.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/teleport_show_radius.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/teleport_show_des.vpcf"
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/teleport_end.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_phoenix.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_techies.vsndevts"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_dark_seer.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"short_range_teleport_start"
				"delay"			"%delay"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_short_range_teleport_delay"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
			
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/teleport_chargeup.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/teleport_show_radius.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "TARGET"
						"ControlPoints"
						{
							"01"	"%radius 0 0"
						}
					}

					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Vulcan.Weeop"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Vulcan.Weeop.End"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}
			
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"short_range_teleport_go"
						"radius"		"%radius"
					}
				}
			}
		}
}

            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelSucceeded"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "summon_vassal"
            "vassal"        "1"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers" 
    { 
        "modifier_build" 
        {
            "IsDebuff" "1"
        }
    }
}//=====================================================================================================

		}

		{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_tek_powered_acquire_targets"
			"Target" 		"CASTER"
			"Duration"		"4"
		}
		}

		"RunScript"

			"ScriptFile"	"heroes/tek_abilities.lua"
			"Function"		"tek_fire_mosquito_missiles"
		}
	}

	{
		"DeleteOnHit"	"1"
		"Damage"
		{
			"Target"		"TARGET"
			"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
			"Damage"		"%AbilityDamage"
		}
	}

			"modifier_tek_powered_acquire_targets"

				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"

				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/tek_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"tek_mosquito_acquire_target"
					}
				}
			}
		}

			"radius"						"3000"

			"stun"							"5 6 7"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"total"							"20 25 30"
		}
	}

		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_timekeeper/timekeeper_chaos_wave.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents\hero_phantom.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/timekeeper_abilities.lua"
				"Function"		"chaos_wave2"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_chaos_wave_freeze"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"Duration"			"%stun"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/timekeeper_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"chaos_wave_cooldown_freeze"
					}
				}
			
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_STUNNED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_FROZEN"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVULNERABLE"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
		}
}

// TIMEKEEPER: Echo
//=====================================================================================================
"timekeeper_echo"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"timekeeper_echo"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"700"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"30"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{
	"01"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"duration"						"5"
		}
	"02"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"max_echo"						"3 4 5 6"
		}
	"03"
		{
			"var_type"						"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"reduction"						"70 65 60 55" // Reduces each echo by this amount
		}
	}
	
	"precache"
		{
		"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_faceless_void/faceless_void_chrono_speed.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents\hero_phantom.vsndevts"
		}
		
	"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_echo"
				"Target" 		"TARGET"
			}
		}
	
	"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_echo"
			{
				"Duration" "%duration"
				"IsHidden" "0"
				"IsPurgable" "1"
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_faceless_void/faceless_void_chrono_speed.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"OnTakeDamage"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/timekeeper_abilities.lua"
						"Function"		"echo"
						"max_echo"		"%max_echo"
						"echo_chance"	"%echo_chance"
						"reduction"		"%reduction"
						"damage"		"%attack_damage"
					}
				}
			}
		}
}//=====================================================================================================

                {
                    "Chance"            "%ch"

                    {
                        "Stun"
                        {
                            "Duration"   "%stun"
                            "Target"    "TARGET"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

        }
        "03"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
            "total_damage"      "160"
        }
        // Extra, calculated as total_damage / channel_time * tick_interval
        "03"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
            "damage_per_tick"   "6.4"
        }
    }

    "precache"
    {
        "particle"  "particles/status_fx/status_effect_shaman_shackle.vpcf"

    }

        "FireSound"
        {
            "EffectName"    "Hero_ShadowShaman.Shackles.Cast"
            "Target"        "CASTER"
        }

        {
            "ModifierName"  "modifier_shackles"
            "Target"        "TARGET"
            "Duration"      "%channel_time"
        }
    }

    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "ModifierName"  "modifier_shackles"
            "Target"        "TARGET"
        }

        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "StopSound"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers"
    {
        "modifier_shackles"
        {
            "IsDebuff"          "1"
    
            "States"
            {
                "MODIFIER_STATE_STUNNED"        "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
            }

            "StatusEffectName"      "particles/status_fx/status_effect_shaman_shackle.vpcf"        
            "StatusEffectPriority"  "10"

            "OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"

            "ThinkInterval"  "%tick_interval"
            "OnIntervalThink"
            {
                "Damage"
                {
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                    "Type"          "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
                    "Damage"        "%damage_per_tick"
                }
            }

            "OnCreated"
            {
                "FireSound"
                {
                    "EffectName"    "Hero_ShadowShaman.Shackles"
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                }
                
                "AttachEffect"
                {
                    "EffectName"            "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/blue_vassal_shackle.vpcf"
                    "EffectAttachType"      "follow_origin"
                    "Target"                "TARGET"
                    "ControlPointEntities"
                    {
                        "TARGET"    "attach_hitloc"
                        "TARGET"    "attach_hitloc"
                        "TARGET"    "attach_hitloc"
                        "TARGET"    "attach_hitloc"
                        "TARGET"    "attach_hitloc"
                        "CASTER"    "attach_hitloc" //Attach to the hands or any desired attach point of the hero
                        "CASTER"    "attach_hitloc"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}//=====================================================================================================

    "AbilityUnitTargetType"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BUILDING"
    "FightRecapLevel"               "1"
    "AbilityTextureName"            "vassal_repair"
    "MaxLevel"                      "1"

    // Casting
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"              "300"
    "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.0"
    "AbilitySharedWithTeammates"    "1"
    
    // Time     
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityChannelTime"            "60"
    "AbilityCooldown"               "15"

    // Damage.
    //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // Cost
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"               "100"
    
    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "heal"              "20"
        }
        "02"
        {
            "var_type"          "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "channel_time"      "60"
        }
    }

    "precache"
        {
            "soundfile"                 "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_tinker.vsndevts"
            "particle"                  "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/green_laser.vpcf"
        }

    "OnSpellStart"
    {

        "ApplyModifier"
        {
            "ModifierName"  "modifier_repair_building_tgt"
            "Target"        "TARGET"
            "Duration"      "%channel_time"
        }
        "ApplyModifier"
        {
            "ModifierName"    "modifier_channeling_vassals"
            "Target"          "CASTER"
        }
    }

    "OnChannelFinish"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "ModifierName"  "modifier_repair_building_tgt"
            "Target"        "TARGET"
        }
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "ModifierName"    "modifier_channeling_vassals"
            "Target"          "CASTER"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers"
    {
        "modifier_repair_building_tgt"
        {
            "IsBuff"          "1"

            "ThinkInterval"  "0.8"
            "OnIntervalThink"
            {
                "Heal"
                {
                    "Target"        "TARGET"
                    "HealAmount"    "%heal"
                }
                "TrackingProjectile"
                {
                    "Target"                "TARGET"
                    "EffectName"            "particles/units/heroes/hero_summoner/green_laser.vpcf"
                    "MoveSpeed"             "1100"
                    "Dodgeable"             "0"
                    "ProvidesVision"        "0"
                    "SourceAttachment"      "DOTA_PROJECTILE_ATTACHMENT_ATTACK_1"
                }
            }
        }
        "modifier_channeling_vassals"
            {
                "IsHidden" "1"
                "ThinkInterval" "0.8"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    // Looping Animation
                    "ApplyModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"  "vassals_animation"
                        "Target"        "CASTER"
                    }
                }
            }

            "vassals_animation"
            {
                "IsHidden" "1"
                "Duration" "0.7"
                "OverrideAnimation" "ACT_DOTA_ATTACK"
            }
    }
}//=====================================================================================================

        }
    }

        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }

    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }
    "OnChannelSucceeded"
    {
        "RemoveModifier"
        {
            "Target" "CASTER"
            "ModifierName" "modifier_build"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "change_vassal"
        }
        "RunScript"
        {
            "ScriptFile"    "heroes/summoner_abilities.lua"
            "Function"      "buildend"
        }
    }

    "Modifiers" 
    { 
        "modifier_build" 
        {
            "IsDebuff" "1"
        }
    }

///@changelog
///@version 2.2
///@type HERO_ABILITY
///@hero War
///@ability Bloodlust
///@changes #
/// Deals damage for a set duration of 6.0s.
/// Deals 30/45/60/75 + 20/30/40/50% of the target's attack damage every 2s.
/// Dispelled when the unit makes 3 successful attacks against enemy Heroes.

"war_bloodlust"
{
    // General
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "BaseClass"             "ability_lua"
    "ScriptFile"            "lua/abilities/war_bloodlust"
    "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
    "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
    "AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
    "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
    "AbilityCastAnimation"          "ACT_DOTA_OVERRIDE_ABILITY_2"
    "AnimationPlaybackRate"         "1.50"
    "FightRecapLevel"               "1"
    "AbilityTextureName"            "war_bloodlust"
    "AoERadius"                     "325"
    
    // Casting
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCastRange"              "425"
    "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.25"

    // Time     
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityCooldown"               "14"

    // Cost
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityManaCost"               "85"

    // Stats
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilityModifierSupportValue"   "0.5"   // Applies two modifiers

    // Special
    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    "AbilitySpecial"
    {
        "01"
        {
            "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "bonus_attack_speed"   "45"
        }
        
        "02"
        {
            "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
            "radius"                "325"
        }

        "03"
        {
            "var_type"              "FIELD_FLOAT"
            "duration"              "5.0"
        }

        "04"
        {
            "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"

"watcher_curse"
{
	// General
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"watcher_curse"

	// Casting
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCastRange"				"0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	
	// Time		
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"
	
	"AbilityDamage"					"0"
	
	// Stats
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityModifierSupportValue"	"0.0"	// All about the damage

	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilitySpecial"
	{

	}
	
	"precache"
	{
		"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_nevermore/nevermore_shadowraze.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_nevermore.vsndevts"
	}
		
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"watcher_curse_effects_mod"
		{
			"Duration" "360"
			"Attributes" "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE" "35"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "-60"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "-30"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS" "-30"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS" "-30"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS" "-30"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_DAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE" "-50"
				
			}
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RemoveAbility"
				{
					"Target" "TARGET"
					"AbilityName" "watcher_curse"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
